name: Date Your Turn
description:
Meet a cast of Diverse Characters with whom you can Date and Dungeon Dive. 

Dates play out through a Visual Novel with choice based dialogue. Learn about this loveable group of outcasts with whom the possibility of romance looms just over the horizon.

Select your Party and Engage in Tactical Turn Based Combat with Dynamic Row Based Targeting, Status Effects, and Stat Influenced  Each Fighter has their own unique Actions, so mix and match to find who works best for you. 

This is an Alpha Demo of Date Your Turn.
